data.name: 5G VR Football
data.detailed_description: Did you ever want to score penalties with your friends from all over the world? Then this game is the right choice. "5G VR Football" is a multiplayer penalty simulator in Virtual Reality. Challenge your friends or enemies from all over the world in a Virtual Reality battle to find out who is the better shooter and who is the better goalie.
data.about_the_game: Did you ever want to score penalties with your friends from all over the world? Then this game is the right choice. data.short_description: "5G VR Football" is a multiplayer penalty simulator in Virtual Reality.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
